definition: to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink
gypsum CaSO4·2(H2O)/plaster/plaster cast (for a broken bone)
herbal plaster applied to a wound
lit. the disease has attacked the vitals (idiom); fig. beyond cure/the situation is hopeless
lit. to squeeze out toothpaste/fig. to extract a confession under pressure
lit. the fat and wealth of the people (idiom); the nation's hard-won wealth (esp. as an object of unscrupulous exploitation)/the people's blood, sweat and tears
dogskin plaster, used in TCM for treating contusions, rheumatism etc/quack medicine/sham goods

sentences.english: I can happily say I've been off drugs for nearly a year now.
sentences.chinese: 我可以兴奋地说我此刻快一年没有沾过福寿膏了。

sentences.english: Cocoa paste, whether or not defatted.
It seemed like a harmless drug.
sentences.chinese: 年夜麻看上往像是一种无害的福寿膏。

sentences.english: Adjusting wet - paste density by adding water towards the end of the mixing was bad operation.
sentences.chinese: 在和膏后期补水调整铅膏密度是不可取的操作。

sentences.english: The principal reaction of slurry paste-mixing is a physical process.
sentences.chinese: 拉浆铅膏的和膏过程其主体反应是一个物理变化过程。

sentences.english: In the meantime, mixzinc oxide and oil of cloves into a white paste.
sentences.chinese: 同时，把氧化锌和丁香油和成白色的膏。

sentences.english: "They don't sit in fine lines like powders do, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “眼影粉会产生细纹，而眼影膏就不会，”她说。

sentences.english: He poured some of the anointing oil on Aaron's head and anointed him to consecrate him.
sentences.chinese: 又把膏油倒在亚伦的头上膏他，使他成圣。

sentences.english: Metal nickel powder, its prepn. method, conductive paste and multi-layer ceramic capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 金属镍粉，其制备方法，导电膏和多层陶瓷电容器。

sentences.english: Objective To study the bacteriostasis of XCJF cream in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解消痤洁肤乳膏在体外的抗菌效果。

sentences.english: Second, with deep peeling cream to remove dead skin cells.
sentences.chinese: 用深层去死皮膏去除角质。

sentences.english: The results showed that psoriasis modulating mixture had selective regulation effects on immune responses.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明银屑解忧膏可选择性地调节免疫功能。

sentences.english: These took the forms of tiger bone pills, plasters, gels and wine.
sentences.chinese: 这些采取了形式的虎骨丸，膏，胶和葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Your acne meds and other drugs may help fry your skin.
sentences.chinese: 痤疮膏或其他药品也许会使皮肤晒黑加剧。

sentences.english: 45 and Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet have anointed him king at Gihon.
sentences.chinese: 祭司撒督和先知拿单在基训已经膏他作王。

sentences.english: Preparation of a novel pigment paste containing no casein;
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍了无酪素颜料膏的实验方法。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
sacrifice to drive away calamity/to dispel/to drive away/to remove
herbal plaster applied to a wound
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
